TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CookieAttribute extends System.Web.ModelBinding.ValueProviderSourceAttribute implements class System.Web.ModelBinding.IUnvalidatedValueProviderSource, class System.Web.ModelBinding.IValueProviderSource

Docs.summary: Represents an attribute that specifies that the values for model binding are provided by a cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.ModelBinding.IValueProvider GetValueProvider(class System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingExecutionContext modelBindingExecutionContext) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method stores all cookie names and values in a dictionary object and then creates and returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.DictionaryValueProvider%601> class.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether cookie values should be validated.
Docs.value: if cookie values are validated; otherwise, . The default is .
